OrgName.entry: PARK CENTRE TRAINING - LIFE LONG LEARNING & SKILLS CENTRE (LLSS)

AltName.entry: PARK COMMUNITY ACTION/LIFE LONG LEARNING AND SKILLS CENTRE

Desc.entry: Courses are NOCN Entry 3, Level 1 and 2 accredited and include: beginners Introduction to Computers course; Word Processing; Publisher; PowerPoint Presentations; Spreadsheets (Excel) and Database (Access). Also offers a Modern Office course (non-accredited. Courses usually run for 11-12 weeks and are available to anyone aged 16 years and over.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon-Wed 9.30-11.45am (12.30pm Level 2) & 1-3.15pm (Computer basic skills training, term-time only), Tues 6-8pm & Wed 5-7pm (ICT basic skills, term-time only)

category.entry: EDUCATION - TRAINING PROVIDERS AND EMPLOYMENT SUPPORT
